title: Jack Bradbury (rugby league)
text: Jack Bradbury (born 4 November 1990 in <a href="Oldham">Oldham</a>, <a href="England">England</a>) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who is in his first professional season with <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>. Primarily a , he signed for the St Helens Academy team after playing youth and amateur football for the Saddleworth Rangers. He represented Lancashire Under-15's team and England Under-16's team during his youth years with the Saddleworth Rangers. In 2010, he left St Helens for <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Oldham%20R.L.F.C.%20players">Heritage № 1267</a>), the town from where he originates.
